https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/71igC5W0WPXttvKGL62RVUn29q5.jpg Yuto Kawasagi works at a bookstore. She also lives as Hideko Katsuki, newly wed to renowned author Dai Katsuki. She is also Charon, a high-class prostitute working for her lover, gangster Michio Jigen. When Dai discovers her secret life, she disappears, and both Michio and Dai set out to find her. Charon
